update qhc_local_user
user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_token = #{userToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profile_photo = #{profilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
login_times = #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update qhc_local_user set user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_token = #{userToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile_photo = #{profilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, login_times = #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_login_name AS userLoginName, u.password AS password, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.real_name AS realName, u.sex AS sex, u.birthday AS birthday, u.address AS address, u.company_name AS companyName, u.user_token AS userToken, u.create_time AS createTime, u.update_time AS updateTime, u.user_status AS userStatus, u.profile_photo AS profilePhoto, u.total_amount AS totalAmount, u.login_times AS loginTimes, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, r.role_id AS roleId, r.role_name AS rolName, r.role_short_name AS roleShortName, u.qq AS qq FROM qhc_local_user u LEFT JOIN qhc_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN qhc_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE 1 = 1
and u.user_login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from qhc_local_user where user_login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from qhc_local_user where user_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from qhc_local_user where user_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from qhc_local_user where user_phone = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_login_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) FROM qhc_local_user lu where 1=1
and lu.user_login_name like concat('%',#{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and lu.user_email like concat('%',#{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and lu.user_phone like concat('%',#{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and lu.address like concat('%',#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and lu.company_name like concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and lu.user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.*, r.role_short_name FROM qhc_local_user u LEFT JOIN qhc_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN qhc_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id where user_token = #{userToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.user_login_name AS userLoginName, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.real_name AS realName, u.sex AS sex, u.birthday AS birthday, u.address AS address, u.company_name AS companyName, u.user_token AS userToken, DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(u.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as updateTime, u.user_status AS userStatus, u.profile_photo AS profilePhoto, CAST(u.total_amount AS CHAR) AS totalAmount, CAST(u.login_times AS CHAR) AS loginTimes, DATE_FORMAT(u.last_login_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS lastLoginTime, r.role_short_name as roleName, l.lab_name as labName FROM qhc_local_user u LEFT JOIN qhc_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN qhc_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN qhc_laboratory l ON u.user_id = l.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
